body_html: I will close the bug, I was able to correctly compile the TF 1.9, now bazel build requires different way of triggering the build in order to find all the required CUDA libraries, on top of this monolithic build almost always shows that build is ok even though some of the libs were not found. Combinations of these 2 things makes it hard to identify the root cause and quickly come up with the solution.
